title: Ticket #1567: cannot submit vm universe jobs via globus
description:
When I attempt to submit vm jobs via the gt2 grid type, I can use globusRSL to set the necessary vm universe parameters, but condor_submit on the gatekeeper refuses to submit the job, because globus explicitly sets input, output, and error to /dev/null. The complaint from condor_submit looks like this: 

ERROR: You cannot use input, ouput, and error parameters in the submit description file for vm universe

There does not appear to be any way to set the globusRSL to prevent the output and error from being set to something.

We could patch the condor jobmanager for globus to not explicitly set input, output, and error for vm universe jobs, but it seems appropriate to also just accept /dev/null as being equivalent to no setting.
